Action.Name: Demonstrates use of the TCPEvents EventGhost plugin.
For use with the EtherEventQueue example sketches.
Configure the TCP Events Plugin with your network settings:

Macro.Name: Send test event

Action.Name: This macro will send the test event every time the event TCP.test is received.

Macro.Action: TCPEvents.SendEvent(u'192.168.69.104', 1024, u'', u'test', u'event', u'"99test payload"', None)
